definitions.definition: a substance that you use with water for washing your body

examples.text: Wash the affected area with **soap and water**.
Avoid using perfumed soaps on sensitive skin.
Clean the wound with mild antibacterial soap.
I switched to liquid shower gel from bar soap.

definitions.definition: a soap opera (= a story about the lives and problems of a group of people that is broadcast every day or several times a week on television or radio)

wordOrigin: Old English sāpe, of West Germanic origin; related to Dutch zeep and German Seife. The verb dates from the mid 16th cent.
